original_title: Underworld figure ‘Piyuma’ brought to Sri Lanka from Dubai
original_body_lines: Piyum Hasthika alias ‘Piyuma’, the main accomplice of underworld figure Salindu Malshika alias ‘Kudu Salindu’, has been brought to Sri Lanka from Dubai early this morning (15) by a special CID team, according to  Minister of Public Security Tiran Alles.
